ygData.subject: Re: Arrival
ygData.msgSnippet: There are no CR chambers at the Iron Fist, there are CR tanks. ... FZ looks over at Delta as the bot wakes up, the Iron Fist getting information from Zardus

There are no CR chambers at the Iron Fist, there are CR tanks.

::FZ::

FZ looks over at Delta as the bot wakes up, the Iron Fist getting 
information from Zardus' mind and putting it into FZ's.

"Welcome back," he says to Delta, "You've been out a long time."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Willaim Zeetsaboy" 
<from_neo_beast_wars@h...> wrote:
> /_\Delta/_\
> 
> "It's dark now....... so dark........ the blackness ....... shear 
> nothingness .... why?......... what happened? ....... where was 
I? ..... Who 
> put me here? ....when was i reactivated? ......I MUST BREAK FREE!!"
> 
> Delta began to move in the CR chamber.  Left to right, right to 
left, he 
> jerked his body around.  Untill the moment he opened his eyes! 
*eyes glow 
> blue* "uhhh......could it be? a CR chamber? *blired vision* and is 
that 
> Zardus?"
> 
> 
>
